name: Dilbert's Eggscelent Adventure
description:
Help Dilbert run and dodge the blasts from evil aliens who want nothing more than to keep him from the delicious eggs that are held with the tower!

Genres: Reverse Tower Defense / Bullet Hell

Basic controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Movement

Spacebar - Spin attack

Escape - Quit menu

Created for Mix and Game Jam 2020 by:

Jash "Primids" Orndorf - Music

Joshua "Szyfr" Zemenski - Development

Sour - Art /Development
